channel.title: Help (Dontor Issues)
channel.description:
Hey guys i was wondering if anyone could help me with my server (BlindScape Base)
How do i make it so you need to be a dontor to use spec How do i make it so you can't see a shop inless your a dontor and all items normal players can't wear How do i add a dontor symbal How do i make it so you need to be a dontor to be able to do fletching. How do i a make it so you can't wear Dragon or barrows inless your a Dontor
Thanks guys.
